mapper.insert: insert into note (title, content, user_id, created_time, authority) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{user.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{authority, jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.select: select n.id as nid, n.title, n.created_time, n.content, n.authority, u.id as uid, u.username, u.picture from note n join user u on n.user_id = u.id where n.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from note where id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
